name: slip n' slide
discri: An exhilarating water activity where participants slide down a long, slippery surface, often made from plastic sheeting, while being sprayed with water. It's a fantastic way to cool off, have fun, and enjoy some high-speed, laughter-filled moments on hot days. Perfect for outdoor parties, picnics, and summer gatherings.
maxTime: This exciting kids party will give your child a birthday of memories and fun picnic games for just
